situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The german shepherd has some spinach. The german shepherd reduced her work hours recently. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: Here is an important piece of information about the german shepherd: if it has a leafy green vegetable then it hides her cards from the poodle for sure. Rule2: Are you certain that one of the animals wants to see the reindeer and also at the same time hides the cards that she has from the poodle? Then you can also be certain that the same animal swears to the rhino. Rule3: The german shepherd will want to see the reindeer if it (the german shepherd) works fewer hours than before.
question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the german shepherd swear to the rhino?
label: proved
